thread.title: Kotoko General Manager Opoku Nti claims success in club's appeal to docked points
thread.title_full: Kotoko General Manager Opoku Nti claims success in club's appeal to docked points

title: Kotoko General Manager Opoku Nti claims success in club's appeal to docked points
text:
10:40 CET Kotoko General Manager Opoku Nti claims success in club's appeal to docked points - www.ghanasoccernet.com Asante Kotoko General Manager Samuel Opoku Nti 
Asante Kotoko's General Manager Samuel Opoku Nti claims he has information the club's docked points for using an unqualified player has been restored. 
The dethroned Premier League champions were docked six points - three of which was awarded to Hearts of Oak - for fielding Obed Owusu â€“ who is considered to be unqualified by the Ghana FA's Disciplinary Committee - in a Premier League game. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
